room_title: Escape room "The Quest of Fortune's Galley" by West Hills Escape Room in Pittsburgh
room_description:
Welcome aboard the old gally that holds pirate's secrets! Locked in the captain's cabin, you must make your way out of the cabin before the crew finds you and makes you walk the plank. Row your boat to victory and uncover the hidden treasure on your way out!
There are two identical rooms available at the location. Each room can hold up to 8 players. Play in one room for a challenging quest, or divide your group into two teams and compete against each other.
